QuestData.Title: Rightful Resting Place
QuestData.Description:
You have truly proven yourself a hero in the eyes of those who are its absolute judge.
I thank you for giving me the honor of holding it, even for this briefest moment. However, it is only proper that you be the one to enshrine the spear at it's rightful resting place.
Let us meet at Hero's Rest where you can do the honors.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enshrine the Spear of Kalliope in its rightful place at Hero's Rest.
